titles: The citizens reply to the whores petition, and prentices answer.
notes: Verse: "Now that you two have made your grievance known ..."
In answer to "The vvhores petition to the London prentices", and "The prentices ansvver to the VVhores petition".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Whores petition to the London prentices.
Prentices ansvver to the VVhores petition.
